headline: SPRITZ SOCIETY AND V8速 PARTNER TO LAUNCH A FIRST-OF-ITS-KIND BLOODY MARY SPRITZ
summary: Spritz Society, the award-winning sparkling cocktail brand, has partnered with V8速, the original plant-powered drink, to develop a first-of-its-kind Bloody Mary Spritz. Combining Spritz Society's passion for high-quality, convenient cocktails and V8's tradition of bold, vegetable-packed flavors, the result is a fresh and unique take on the traditional Bloody Mary.
